attributes.action: Stop the House of Lords changing the Brexit Bill before Article 50 is submitted.
attributes.background: The House of Lords wants to amend the Brexit Bill to include a provision for all EU citizens currently living in the UK to have the right to stay in the UK regardless of how the EU treats British citizens living in the EURO.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for. We can't accept petitions calling on the House of Lords to take action.
